name: MaFl_Waforu
oralText: Step right up, champions! Welcome to the Red Chip Emporium!
introText: Heya stranger! If your guild wins the Guild Siege, you will be awarded Red Chips for your victory. The armor sets I sell here in my shop are absolutely the best you can find! So how many Red Chips do you have, hmmmm?
byeText: So long, contender. May Rhisis be with you.

links.title: Who are you?
texts: I am Wafor, the Battle Merchant. I've had my share of victories in the sieges, but I'm getting to old for that sort of thing. I still love the competition, however, so i decided  to stay in the business and offer my services as a Red Chip Vendor.

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: So long, contender. May Rhisis be with you.
